website_summaries.verdict: This warm, generously cut jacket is a good budget pick for the casual skier.
pros: Comfortable with quick-dry polyester and a faux fur lining
Owners like the adjustable cuffs with thumb hole, snap power skirt, internal draw-cord hem, and relaxed fit
Has zippered chest pocket, media pocket, fixture for headphones
cons: Material is good for infrequent ski trips but may not hold up to regular use

customer_reviews.title: NEEDLES SEWN INTO SLEEVE! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this purchase. Literally it was dleivered and then taken on a ski trip. I went to take the jacket off and was stabbed by something sharp in the sleeve. I tried to locate the sharp object and was stabbed multiple times. I found that when I pulled the sharp pieces they did not come out. I had to rip open the jacket to remove them only to find 5 sharp broken needles inside my sleeve armhole. I'm appalled that the craftsmanship is so poor to quality control and make sure that this item is safe for customers. DO NOT BUY! SHARP NEEDLES SEWN INTO GARMENT! WIll return and never buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 5'7 @ 160 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in and tried it on... perfect fit! I can still fit my thermals under, but already super warm/hot. By the way I'm 5'7 and weight 160. I got a size X-Large
customer_reviews.author: Yessika

customer_reviews.title: Had already been used
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the way it fits BUT not happy overall. I purchased this "brand new" jacket but it just happened to come with cough drops and a cheeto in one of the pockets. This jacket has clearly been used and returned...
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very warm
customer_reviews.text: Got and XL im 5'7 and 200lb 38D bra. fits perfect. Super warm comfy and waterproof. Went snow borading and on a hike with 2 layers under it. and ended up sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I never buy coats online but couldn't resist when I saw this coat for such a price and needed a decent one for snowboarding. I ordered size small, I am 5'3" and 120lbs and the coat fits like a dream! Excellent quality and is extremely warm. I took a chance on the red and the color is perfect and vibrant, the inside is not fleece more of s faux fur but very warm and actually softer than expected. Will probably buy another in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality Jacket
customer_reviews.text: We bought Jackets for a ski Trip to Colorado. When the jackets came in we were so surprised that the quality and fit (using the chart) were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Helm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Michigan weather
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with this coat. It seems well made and is a nice thick coat. I am 222 lbs, 5' 10" with a 42 inch chest, 37 inch waist and 47 inch hips. I ordered the XL and it is big, but I like being able to fit a good sized sweater under my coat. I would have probably been safe with a large. I have been wearing this coat in 20 degree weather and snow and I am toasty warm in this thing. Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Combs

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this jacket but it’s HUGE! I ordered a size small and an 5’2, 110lbs. I tightened the sides to see if that would help, but the sleeves and shoulders were so large it looked like I was wearing my husbands jacket. It did seem extremely warm though but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Farren Clemenzi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Won't last.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and warm for the winter. It will keep you dry, definitely waterproof. But ALL the pockets had holes in them. The sleeves that you are supposed to ajust with Velcro don't stick closed I had to use 3 clothes pins on each sleeve to keep them in place, and the left side of the jacket ripped open from hip to breastbone for no known reason meaning it didn't even last 1 full winter. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Malm

customer_reviews.title: Quality disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fits big. I ordered a medium but should have ordered a small. However, I am disappointed in the quality-my pocket split and ripped the first day that I wore the coat; this was different from other reviews I had read.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated really liked it. But it wont last
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good material jacket it does do the job of keeping you warm but it will only be for couple weeks before the material starts to break up on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: After one use, this coat began falling apart. The material is cheap, and the stitching is poor. The exterior coat pockets both ripped and the stuffing began falling out. If you are planning to use this coat for any outdoor winter activity (hiking, skiing, snowboarding), it doesn’t seem like it would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: Freaking amazing jacket for the price. Very high quality, lux feel (although a little on the large side, got the small I'm 120 pounds 5'4'' but I like a looser fit so it worked for me). I almost bought a $300 jacket from REI first, but decided to give this a go since there are free returns, and boy am I glad I did! I saved myself over 200 bucks and can spend that money on fermented shark meat on my trip to Iceland. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: This coat is completely rain proof and made out of durable material. I have not had a chance to test it out in the snow but a nice inner liner on the sleeves to keep snow from getting on your wrists. So far it is holding up well! It is also great against wind. I keeps me very warm in 20 degree weather so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Hilditch

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT READ NEGATIVE REVIEWS!! It's thick, warm, perfect size. AMAZING!! I love it. It's a great quality, can't wait for it to rain this week. I'll update again after I have had it for some time. I'm 5'2", 42D, with a round bottom. It fits perfectly, not too tight, not to loose, I got a 2XL and glad I did. The bonus is the thumb hole inner cuffs at the end if the sleeves. The hood does unzip. I got the black one. Will post pictures while in the rain. I'm a Cali girl that moved to South Carolina and anytime its under 70° I freeze. I think this is going to be the best jacket EVER!!! 😁😁😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Low price. Low quality. Good features and all, but not fit for long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large so I'll have some space to wear a couple more layers underneath. However, it was a lot bigger that I could wear another jacket underneath if I wanted. The quality of the material is not comparable to that of the well-known brands that are famous for snow conditions. It may look, feel, and has features (pockets, etc), but the material quality is on the lower end. Though I do think if someone is looking to use this in rougher conditions and not for long-lasting then this would be the jacket. Things like snowboarding and rough-handling, I can't imagine this would outlast too many adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Batman Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great, Warm Jacket for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket!! I am in MN, so it gets a little chilly! I usually wear a 2xl, but ordered a 3xl so I would have room to wear a sweatshirt underneath. Plenty of room. My only gripe is that the end of the zipper is scratchy and irritating against my chin when I am completely zipped up. Thinking of putting some fabric over it as a buffer. Overall, though, this is a fantastic jacket for the money!
customer_reviews.author: eckle75

customer_reviews.title: It's more like a men's coat
customer_reviews.text: I've had this coat for 4 years now and the longer I've owned it the more I've grown to hate it. Yeah it's warm but it doesn't fit. I ordered a small because well I'm small... and in reality it arrived like a men's medium, its HUGE on me. I hate wearing it because I look like a marshmallow. That being said it's kept me super warm in the freezing cold so it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Evette G.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ski coat
customer_reviews.text: This ski jacket was so perfect, I can’t love it enough. So many pockets! I wore it skiing in Breck, CO in late Feb, record temps and snow in the last five years apparently. Snowed for three days, I still sweat on the mountain in 7-12 degree snow. It was wonderful. This jacket is perfect for skiing. It looks bulky but it’s pretty easy to move in so it’s not hard to get up out of the snow when you fall either lol. I fell into a snow bank (newb, I know) but didn’t feel restricted by the jacket when getting out. It’s really the perfect snow jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jade

customer_reviews.title: but this jacket kept me more than comfortable. It was hands down the BEST purchase for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for a road trip through some colder states. At one point it was 20 degrees, dark, and windy, but this jacket kept me more than comfortable. It was hands down the BEST purchase for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: I loved the jacket
customer_reviews.text: I loved the jacket ... *****BUT it does NOT run small!************ I read the comment that they ran small so I ordered a Size: Medium NOT TRUE. A small would have been fine. I did not have time to return and reorder. BUT THE JACKET ITSELF WAS TERRIFIC!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Busse

customer_reviews.title: Nice but runs a little small IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket but I ordered a Large thinking I'd have a little extra room.. (I'm 129lbs, 5'3", 36C) It fits a little snug so you really can't wear anything too bulky under it. I ordered it to keep me warm while driving my Jeep. I always drive topless/doorless. It's warm, just a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: lorie

customer_reviews.title: Warm but Velcro Fails
customer_reviews.text: This coat is nicely warm, water resistant just as advertised - BUT - the hood closure at the neck is very poor. It is velcro that doesn't want to stick together in the first place and flies open at the slightest breeze. I use an exterior scarf to keep it tightened as by the time I discovered this issue I could no longer return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: ShamrockMe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Thia jacket is beyond warm. I work outside on the great lakes on the water and this jacket has kept me warm to the point of sweating some days. It also has an extremely soft inner liner and the silky hand cuffs are soft and warm around d the wrists. This jacket puts my carhartt to shame. The outer shell is also water proof which makes working in the sleet and snow easier. Buy it. You won't regret. I bought 2 sizes up as reviews said they run a little small and I wanted room for bibs and a heavy sweatshirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Martin

customer_reviews.title: Extremely warm!
customer_reviews.text: I live in upper Michigan this week it is -25/-35 degrees below zero wind chill, I received this jacket, it is as pictured. It is extremely warm and durable. I have worn it outside with absolutely no wind or cold coming through. It is water resistant as I have gotten snow on it and stayed dry. The arm cuffs that you can put your thumb through are nice too because you can put it over your gloves. I would absolutely recommend this jacket and it's much cheaper than name brands I know
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Warm, Warm. 🙂
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect for cold weather, and great for ❄snow❄. I was fully warm the whole time; it was cold, raining, snowing windy at different times... I even had to roll down my window a few times, because I got a little too warm, but if I didn't wear it in the car I got cold❄. I highly recommend this jacket. If you need one, just buy it, you won't regret it. I have worn it the whole trip, and so far, it has no flaws. Cool pockets too, that just me, though. 🎁👍👍🎄
customer_reviews.author: 4given2_4give

customer_reviews.title: Jacket to stay warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself this jacket because I do not handle cold at all. I really sort of just suffer through winter, but I read some of its reviews and some said that others bought it for a trip to Alaska and it did well. So I thought I might have a chance at being warm. Haha This jacket did help me stay warm. I love it! It was a bit long and loose but it does well still. Cuz I thought I might have to bundle up a bit I would still have room. The jacket has a 2inch spot under the arm where the seam wasn't stitched. However, the cold doesn't get through.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Update: It was about 20 degrees F in Alaska and this jacket kept me extremely warm. It is definitely waterproof as well. Original Review: I ordered this jacket for an upcoming trip to Alaska. I'm 5'8", 145lbs and the medium fits perfect. I can layer a good amount underneath without feeling like a marshmallow. The quality of the jacket is great. Some others have said the hood is not detachable, however mine is. The inside is lined with faux fur. The thumb hole/gloves are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Adair

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I cut corners by purchasing this jacket. Worse it once and the pocket tore when I went to zip it open. Really poor quality and -- it's almost like a thin, ironed on plastic around all the pockets so I'm guessing this would have happened with all of them. I used this to ski and in Colorado -- it wasn't warm enough. It was a warm jacket overall and comfortable aside from the torn pocket, but when you're at high altitude and cold temps... you're better of with something designed for skiing. I won't purchase this brand again given the weird reinforcement (or lack there of) around the pockets -- almost felt like thick paper. It was very weird.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket, but read the sizing on it.
customer_reviews.text: I was reading the reviews and one of the girls said that she ordered a large and it was really tight around her hips. That it was only 40 inches or something, so based on that review, I ordered an XL. This jacket came to me and felt like a Men's XXL. It was huge! I ended up having to return it and find a jacket here in the area because I needed something within the next day or two. The jacket did have a very soft lining and would have been really warm. Just pay close attention to the sizing. It would have been a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee D.

customer_reviews.title: Sooo warm!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY complaint I have is that the sleeves are a tad bit short for me, but otherwise this jacket has been amazing! I am 5'9, 125lbs and always cold. I'll have 3 or 4 layers on in the winter to stay warm usually. With this jacket I've gone out in just a tank top underneath in 30 degrees and been warm! I ordered a medium and it's a perfect fit. Definitely wouldn't recommend for weather warmer than the low 40s or your gonna get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Dani-L

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This coat appears hip length and slightly fitted. It absolutely is not. It was short and wide and the seams under the arms felt like they had a giant marble in them. Both sides, not just one. I couldn’t even put my arms down, it was so uncomfortable. However it was a very warm coat. Refund/return was completely hassle free. I did not exchange, just returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.  And it fits!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jacket that: 1) fit comfortably; 2) had a hood; 3) had both inner and outer pockets; 4) would be warm/cozy; and 5) would be pretty much wind- and waterproof. This jacket has it all! I wasn't looking for "pretty," or "attractive," but I got that, too ~ in addition to all of the above, this jacket is also both lovely and flattering. And, lastly, but just as importantly, it is very well made. Thanks, Wantdo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was perfect for extreme cold weather in Stowe Vermont. I was extremely warm and comfortable. I did size up for clothes underneath. There’s a little pocket on the inside chest and that’s where I put my lift ticket. They were able to scan through all those layers. I would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of last winter. Probably wore twice. Busted it out two weeks ago for the coming winter. Wore it for barely a week and the zipper broke. Only way to fasten it now is by two Velcro strips that do not work very well. At first, I thought you get what you pay for, but then I looked back on my orders and realized I paid almost $80 for a coat that didn’t get me through even one full month of winter. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TuckeredOutt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cold weather jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my recent winter trip to Colorado, where the temperature was down to the single digits more than once while I was there. This jacket was perfect for keeping me warm. Also, I was concerned that it would be a tight fit, but I usually wear a small and I ordered a small. It fits well. If you’re someone who enjoys a bit more room to layer clothing or just doesn’t like their clothes to fit tightly to their body, order a size up. Overall, this jacket is way better than expected from an Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Spence

customer_reviews.title: This coat is beautiful. The fur inside makes it very comfortable and ...
customer_reviews.text: This coat is beautiful. The fur inside makes it very comfortable and warm. I live in Northern NH where it gets very cold and it snows a lot and I am toasty warm in this jacket. I bought one for my daughter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Martin

customer_reviews.title: Made this Alaskan happy
customer_reviews.text: I live in Alaska and have worn Columbia jackets all my life, but their price has gone up more than I can afford. I am happy to report that after three months of wearing, this jacket is as warm and well built as my Columbia ones were, at a fraction of the cost. The only thing I don't like about this jacket is a plastic piece at the wrist, but I would still buy this jacket again because it keeps me warm at -35 and the pockets are well designed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Julian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass this jacket up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket looks and fits great!! Previously bought a different jacket at a higher price point and was disappointed. This jacket blew me out of the water. Will be purchasing in other colors as well! Keeps you nice and warm even while night skiing in freezing temps. Has plenty of pockets and a detachable hood. Overall best ski purchase I have made on amazon. This deserves 6 stars!! Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: K n M

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I HATE THIS JACKET. It is OVERPRICED GARBAGE. Whatever you do, do NOT purchase this jacket. It literally is falling apart in every way possible. I've had it for barely 2 months. It is poorly sewn, moderately warm. It's worth more along the lines of $20 not nearly $80. I wanted to love this jacket and purchased it based on all the positive reviews. But they must be paid reviews as the other low raters had the same issue I do. You're better off forking out the extra money for North Face or other quality known jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it. Says it’s nice and warm and keeps the wind and cold out with the adjustable parts of the jacket along with the sleeves. The only complaint, or something to keep in mind before ordering, is if you are busty you might want to go a size larger than what the size chart says else it might feel too tight and harder to zip up along the chest area. Other than that this jacket is great. Has five pockets to store personal items like an I’d badge for work, tissues, cell phone, keys, etc. Is pretty light weight for the size as well. It was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable, and I love the color! I'm usually an XS (size 0-2), but decided to buy a S, since I'll typically wear this over layers. I'd say it runs true to size because the Small was a little too roomy for me, but I decided to make it work! I'm glad I did, it's very comfortable and I do prefer to have a little bit more space in the jacket to allow air to circulate. I would definitely recommend this jacket, it's a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina XO

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This coat is so warm and so far has washed very well. Washed on delicate and tumble dried on a low setting. I orded a 2X which is what I usually wear in coats and it has plenty of room to move without any restrictions as well as being able to wear a light hoodie underneath. The color is exactly what I expected. I would recommend this coat to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and versatile winter coat
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright shade of blue! It really is beautiful in person and true to its online representation. It is very versatile with a hood that zips off and extensions of the inner sleeve with thumb holes. The construction is not as high quality as the fancy name brand winter coats, but it is likely to last me several winters. I wish the shape was a bit more form-fitting, but it serves its purpose and works well as a winter coat for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Warm jacket with good zippers
customer_reviews.text: The zippers were of a good quality. The jacket itself is really warm. The hood closes well and if you are going where it will be consistently cold, I would recommend the jacket. I sent it back for the following reasons: * felt bulky under my arms * inflexible with respect to temperature - can't remove anything to make the jacket cooler * bulky, heavier jacket I liked the hand extensions with thumb loops. That is not something I saw on many other coats.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect! Super warm, without feeling like you have a super heavy jacket on that makes it difficult to move around. It does run a little big, which is fine with me in case I wear a hoodie underneath. My only complain is the brand name is pretty large on the left front chest is yellow. It stands out pretty well. It has some really nice features to keep the wind out, and is long enough to cover most of my rear end. 😉 I love in the Midwest, today's high is -8, -28 with the wind chill. This jacket definitely did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Krisi

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR WET WEATHER
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant or waterproof it is most definitely NOT. The reviews were promising so I purchased it for a trip to Iceland. Within an hour I was soaked completely through to the point that my passport on the inside mesh pocket was soaking wet. The jacket probably weighs 20 pounds now it has soaked up so much water. I am actually able to wring out the sleeves. Sadly I am too late for a refund or I would be looking for my money back. The only positive thing I can honestly say is that it is a nice quality if you aren’t bothered about staying dry.
customer_reviews.author: F.G

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I bought it for our trip to Antarctica but I am wearing it all the time here in North Carolina. I like the thumb loops to keep the sleeves down, the zip up pockets, the optional zip on/off hood, and the way I can close it up around my neck in the cold wind. It's warm indeed! Adding - now that I returned from Antarctica: It was PERFECT. I was never cold and it protected from the wind, too!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm in the Arctic Circle
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket to go glacier hiking and into the Arctic Circle in Alaska. It was warm and fit well. Although when I got it the zipper wasn't working properly and got stuck all the time while trying to zip it up but my brother got the same jacket and was fine. I was completely warm in crazy negative temperatures. Be in 2am standing outside for hours looking at the Aurora or just walking down a trail, I never got cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the jacket looked and felt great as described in the specs online
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a woman's medium jacket but ordered this in a small based on other reviews and the size chart. I am 5'6 1/2, 144 lbs, and typically wear a size S or M shirt. The quality of the jacket looked and felt great as described in the specs online, but when I tried it on it looked too boxy on me in the shoulders and in my mid section. I do have a longer torso, so the jacket did look a little shorter than I wanted it to. I will be returning it and looking for another brand of ski jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Thumb holes were uneven. I could barely get my left thumb through the hole. On the right, the thumb hole was all the way down to my wrist, exposing my hand. Returned the item ASAP. I’m 5’3” and 116 lbs. Small was too snug for my comfort. This is the first time I’d ever consider buying a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Windproof, waterproof, and warm. Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Warm winter coat. So far it has kept me warm in the teens, with wind. I love how many pockets it has, both inside and outside. Most of them zip. The inner lining is a warm faux fur. The hood doesn't velco closed around a scarf, so I use the pulls to keep it tight. Despite this, it stays on even in wind. The wrists include a stretchy fabric that fits around your thumb to keep your wrists warm, but the sleeves don't quite feel long enough to use those comfortably. I'm 5'3 and I bought a small, but a medium might have been a good choice too.
customer_reviews.author: teacup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I live in ND and travel a lot. Our temperatures can be extreme. I needed something that would keep me warm. The rain and snow mixtures, that can happen around here, it doesn't soak in and keeps me warm and that's exactly what I wanted!!! I followed the measurements that they recommended to do. When I have the jacket on I feel not overly warm I feel very comfortable and it doesn't feel like I'm wearing a heavy winter jacket which is a huge plus!!!!! I highly highly recommend to this jacket!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket so much! it took me forever to find a warm jacket that actually fit me nicely. This is a great jacket for cold weather. I used it to go skiing at Mount Hood in Oregon and it did its job! fit me nicely and wasn't too big or to small. It did arrive with a cut in it but Amazon made it right and sent me another one. Love the jacket lots of great pockets on the inside and outside for storage. Was able to keep everything I needed with me from my phone to hand warmers to keys etc. Love this jacket and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful and more vibrant than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our trip to Iceland (we live in Florida). While I haven't tried it out in cold weather yet, it's light and the fleece lining is warm. The color is beautiful and more vibrant than the pictures, which i was really happy about (I bought the blue). The finger holes in the sleeves will come in handy and are comfy. I ordered an XL, I usually wear an L or XL and this for perfect with some room for layers. But if you're looking for a "figure flattering" larger coat, this is a bit boxy. I'm probably going to buy a more figure flattering coat to have with me just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jacket! Perfect for winter festivities.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing! Inam 5'4" and 170lb and ordered a large. It has thumbholes so you can put gloves on with now skin showing. It's super warm to the point I sweat sometimes even if it's freezing out. I alsonlike how there is a thick band inside the jacket around the waist with rubber grips to stay secure and snug. Perfect for doing anything snow sport related. My only grievance is I wish the liner was removable on those days where I just want the water resistance and not the warmth. But that it's a great jacket nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Larson

customer_reviews.title: returned this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a Christmas gift and we ended up returning it. She is usually between a small and medium in tops/jackets. I bought her a medium and it fit well everywhere except the sleeves. They are on the shorter side and have a flimsy material underneath with thumb holes. The material was stretched to the max when she tried putting her thumbs in the holes. I tried the jacket on too, as I am usually a medium and it was very tight all over for me. The material felt warm and water resistant, however the sizing was just all off.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and about 125 lbs and a Medium in this jacket fits just right for me. The coat is below hip length, and fits loose enough to fit over a sweater or hoodie if need be. The sleeves have a nice knit cuff that comes well down on the wrist which is a great featuren in cold weather. The color is very true to the photo so that definitely doesn't disappoint either. This will be my first Minnesota winter so we'll see if it's warm enough when the cold weather gets here, but I expect it to preform quite nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Faurot

customer_reviews.title: The internal seams are bulky
customer_reviews.text: Just received the winter coat and am very disappointed. I really needed it for tomorrow; however, it is very uncomfortable. While it fits as expected, the seams under the armpits are too bulky (as if they are folded in many layers) and it makes it difficult for me to normally move around. I feel those seams because they jam me under the arms while wearing the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Olena

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this jacket. Kept me nice and warm in Yellowstone and Park City, Utah. I loved all of the pockets it offered. It is on the heavy/bulky side for a jacket compared to the newer and thinner coats offered by other brands. Loved the color too. I wanted to make sure I stood out in the snow since so many jackets seem to be black or white which you will blend in with nature. If anything bad happens while skiing, snowmobiling, etc. I want to make sure others can see me and I don't blend in with the snow.
customer_reviews.author: V. Walz

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I do not feel the cold at all while wearing this thing at all. As a matter of fact it radiates warmth. I got the xl, and it fits perfectly around my hips. It's loose enough around the top that I would definitely add layers and still not have it be too snug. The elastic seal at the bottom keeps cold air from creeping up into the jacket from the bottom. The thumb sleeves help keep cold air from creeping up the sleeves as well. I get compliments on it often and definitely recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: QuarkieSparticle

customer_reviews.title: No need to size up for layering
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was very well made and warm. I just ordered a size too large because I wanted to have room for layering, and I didn't need to go a size up for that. I am returning and ordering my usual size. This will be for a trip to Iceland in March when the high temps for the day will be in the 30's with snow or rain, so waterproof is mandatory. I think it will work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, seriously.
customer_reviews.text: This coat is a steal. I was shocked at how warm and well made it is. Luckily, it didn’t arrive with any busted seams or defects. ( However, I did noticed some reviews showed theirs did ). For $70 I expected a mediocre snowboarding jacket that’d get me through a season or two. This coat exceeds my expectations, it’s heavily lined (I’m perpetually cold), got a great elastic skirt liner inside, water proof as could be, has thoughtfully places pockets and color was exactly as pictured. 100% worth it. I modified and tailored it, couldn’t be more stoked to wear to it. I normally wear XS, I’d say the original measurement for small, fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Adventure jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for my Utah winter adventure, and man am I glad I did! The average day temp was 40 and nights were high 20s. Hit snow and rain. I didn’t take this thing off for 2 weeks and thought it was going to smell permanently like camp fire! Had a base layer under it and was pretty much all I needed when I wasn’t hiking (too bulky for that) in addition to the camp fire at night. Definitely ideal for temps under 50.
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coat!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is perfect! Pockets for everything. It fits perfect and is lightweight but unbelievably warm and comfortable. We had been living in Florida for the winters since 2003 and needed winter coats when we moved back early spring 2019 and I bought a dark blue 3X for my husband. He absolutely loved it even with a hood which he hates but loved it and the way it laid. So this winter I needed a new coat so I purchased red for me an I love everything about it! Comfortable, warm but still lightweight and easy to move around in and waterproof. All the pocket/compartments are perfect for just about every need. I highly recommend buying this coat!
customer_reviews.author: Cmor269

customer_reviews.title: Warm skiing jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a whole day skiing at Crystal Mountain, WA and I’m very happy with it! It’s warm and comfortable, has enough pockets for my phone, credit card, and tissue paper. The size was a little tricky for me since the large I first ordered ran big but was comfortable yet the medium fitted a little tight. I think if you want more space for undershirts then go with a size bigger, if you want tight fit then go with your normal size. I ended up taking the medium since I like it more snug (and right on top of my skiing pants) in case it gets too windy/cold.
customer_reviews.author: ValH

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this coat!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about finding a coat on line and waited months to take the plunge. My former winter coat was a 3-in-1 and kept me warm for years. I am so glad I decided to treat my self. This coat is amazingly warm and much lighter in weight than my last one. The pockets are huge. I wore it outside on a day when we had 40pmh wind gusts and temps in the twenties and I was not cold at all. I do have to take it off if I'm in a store to shop because I will overheat. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PenguinMom

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Cold Temps
customer_reviews.text: I wore this jacket on a trip to Iceland in the winter and it's fantastic! The weather was unpredictable and I experienced snow, wind, and rain all in one day and this coat kept me warm and dry, even on glaciers. The jacket dried off quickly and it's much better quality than expected. This kept me so warm that I even started sweating at a certain point while walking around waterfalls and Reykjavik. The multiple pockets and general construction are awesome as well. Can't wait to wear it on my next adventure to a cold location.
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Aurora
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I decided to purchase this coat. I needed something that would keep me warm on my trip to Sweden and Norway. It did just that! The reviews were very helpful so I'd thought I'd add mine. The temperature was in the low to mid 20sF and it was my third layer as I waited for over 2 hours to see the Northern Lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my girlfriend and her first Colorado snowboarding trip. Jacket quality is great. She is 5'5 and 115 lbs and the small fit her perfect. The inside is very soft and warm. It is awesome to see that it had a snow skirt built in. Jacket was made prepared for the snow. The exterior kept her dry very well after falling in the snow multiple times. It withheld the two days of snowboarding just fine. No tears or complications. I would recommend this jacket to anyone going on their first snowboarding trip or snow trip and not looking to spend a fortune on snow gear. She was happy with the style and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME ski jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg on a ski jacket, so I did some research on amazon and this one had the best reviews and best bang for my buck. so I purchased it and I couldn't be more impressed!!! I could've gone with a small easily but chose to buy one size up (Medium) so that I had plenty of room for layers underneath. I'm 5'4, 140lb, athletic build. I love all the pockets, the fur/warmth on the inside, and the waist band that tightens to prevent snow from making it's way up your back if you fall :) overall VERY happy with this jacket!!!! highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have much form to it
customer_reviews.text: It's VERY warm and soft and good quality but the proportions were a bit off for me. I'm almost always a medium but the waist and chest were very loose. The arms felt loose and then tight at the wrists. It just wasn't a good cut/fit for me. 5'8" 160lb pear shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really a great value altogether
customer_reviews.text: Really a warm jacket w a lot of pockets in a lot of unusual locations, incl. Inside the jacket. The hood seems a little clumsy because I'm always pushing it back off my eyes. The thumb keyhole sleeve is really flimsy, like it might tear after not much use & not very long or warm. Has zipper as well as Velcro and a bottom big snap that I appreciate. Altogether, very bright colored and useful and warm and at the sale price was a great purchase for me so far!
customer_reviews.author: dottyebran

customer_reviews.title: I can easily zip and maneuver around my hips with the XL ...
customer_reviews.text: The coat is warm as long as you are moving around. I find that if I’m sitting in the cold (sporting events) I lose more heat than expected. I bought an XL to make sure there is room for sweatshirts and it’s slightly too large - sleeves are definitely too long (I’m 5’2”, 170 - mostly on hips). I can easily zip and maneuver around my hips with the XL and believe I probably could with a L too. Also, the pockets are not really warm at all. There’s no fleece lining or anything on the inside and it’s just one thin layer between my hands and the bitter cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one month
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed when we first got this coat super cute super warm excellent fit. The return window closed on November 27 and on December 9 my daughter got out of our vehicle and while she was reaching for the door handle the entire side seems split wide open. I had expected more for a coat at this price point. I will be contacting the seller to see if there’s anything I can do but for now I advise to go with a different coat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zea

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof-Absolute wrong Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I just received this jacket. This is absolutely not what is shown in the picture. There is a picture which shows it was 20K rated but the jacket I received does not even have that sticker. It only shows windproof not WATERPROOF. This is absolute cheating and the product is garbage. PLEASE, DO NOT BUY THIS JACKET !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable coat
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country side of Wisconsin, USA and I love this coat! It is very warm even when it's below 0*F. I do not feel the wind at all, the snow band at the bottom helps with that. The snow/water beads up on it and doesn't soak in at all The pockets are nicely sized and zipper shut, one on the inside zips and fits a large phone with plenty of room to spare. I had to shovel with it unzipped because it was too warm 10*F and need to take it off in the car or I overheat. It looks very nice, feels heavy, very warm, I would definitely purchase this coat again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. It's super warm. I do volunteer work and can be outside in the cold for hours at a time. The fleece lining makes it very snuggly. It's made extremely well. I was impressed by it's craftsmanship. Lots of pockets with zippers. Looks just like in the picture. I even ordered the men's version for my boyfriend and recommended it to my fellow volunteers. It washes well and retains color.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket with built in gloves
customer_reviews.text: An excellent and warm jacket. It has lots of inside pockets for all that necessary stuff. One nice features is that each sleeve has a fingerless glove built in! I have used this feature many, many times! Both my husband and I each bought this versatile jacket. It has worked out so well in our extreme Midwest winter both during light 40 degree days and -20.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality but keeps me warm over a few layers
customer_reviews.text: I had this coat about 2 weeks and the pocket lining came undone. Now the pocket is useless and I can't use it. At the end of the sleeve there are thumb holes, the holes came un- sewn after about a month. Also, this coat is not as warm as I thought it would be, I still have to wear long sleeves and a sweater/ hoodie under the coat to stay warm. One big positive is that it is waterproof; just need to find a way to keep the hood up is it's windy (the piece that would keep the hood up is too tight for me).
customer_reviews.author: ALyssa O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase that arrived quickly, did the job, and looked good!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is hands-down one of the best Amazon purchases I've EVER made, which is saying a lot considering that I order from them almost weekly ;) I bought this jacket for a last-minute ski trip to Beaver Creek and was very pleasantly surprised with the fit, quality, and thoughtful pocket placement. The furry lining is super warm around the body and hood, and the smooth material lining the sleeves helps for sliding bulky clothing layers down the sleeves without having your other layers bunch up to your elbows as you thread your arms through. For reference, I am 5'5" and ~160 lbs (muscular build/not fluffy) and the MEDIUM fit like a dream...even with thermals, shirt, and thin vest underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hood

customer_reviews.title: Watch for odd material bulge under both armpits.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jacket for my 11 year old daughter (5 ft 2 inches, 96 lbs) and a size small in aqua fit her nicely. We were going to keep the jacket until we realized there are weird fabric bulges under each armpit that make it uncomfortable to put your arms fully down at your sides. I'm also 5 ft 2 inches, 118 lbs; I tried on the jacket and found it to be uncomfortable in the same area. Perhaps it's a one-time defect. Also, the material is a little on the loud (crinkly) side, but it might soften up with wear or a washing. The jacket is very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mcp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect when you have to be outside in cold, wet weather. It’s really warm with a very comfortable fit, not choking you when you have it zipped all the way up with the hood on. I wore it walking my dogs at 33 degrees and hard rain. I almost didn’t mind except that the dogs got soaked.
customer_reviews.author: not a gadget geek

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality/ not the color in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this coat got 4.5 stars. The quality is super cheap. It's not red and black, it's grey and black. There is no fleece on the inside, just cheap faux fur that will mat in no time. There were strings left all over that needed to be cut off, the material feels terrible. It's very big in the middle, the sleeves are short and it's just plain ugly in real life. Maybe people's standards have gone down, but this coat is not worth it imo. And it's made in China, I don't like supporting China and I missed that. Very disappointed. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Stegospine

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat, nice price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 6’1 woman, 150lbs. I ordered a Large to guarantee the length of the arms, and they’re just right! The body has an adjustable strap to pull it close and snug at the bottom, so with it being a little to big around it’s easy to change! I walked my husky the other day in 18 degree (fahrenheit) and actually got a little too warm! The coat feels nice and heavy, nice quality, and will be wonderful for those very chilly temps!
customer_reviews.author: Annah Batka

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was one of like 3 pieces I got to test out. I chose this one because it fit the best, it was cost effective, and I was short on time. Wearing it snowboarding in Mammoth, I found that with 4 light layers (tank tops, and thin long sleeve, and a thicker long sleeve) it kept me perfectly warm. I wore a bib underneath (snow overalls) so there was no issue with snow getting down my pants when I fell. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase : )
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Jacket for Iceland
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from my 5-day trip to Iceland and this jacket served me well. Great quality, less expensive compare to Columbia and NF jackets, and roomy in the arms, great for layering. This jacket is definitely waterproof and windproof, and kept me warm and dry especially with Iceland's unpredictable weather. It's also a comfortable jacket and wore it during Glacier Hiking and Ice Climbing tour. Love the yellow color and probably the best clothing item that I purchased on Amazon. Do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the XXL and it fits like it was made for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" 240lbs. I ordered the XXL and it fits like it was made for me. That's a big deal for a big girl like me! Very warm, lots of pockets, and I really love the extra bit of sleeve with the thumb hole. My new favorite coat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Dauby

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying Purchase, Especially for Taller Ladies
customer_reviews.text: Quite toasty in Chicago's fall & wintery weather so far, which has been enormously valuable, although when I'm still wearing it inside the train, it can get a bit uncomfortably warm. The jacket length is only slightly shorter than the chart suggests, and the torso section feels a tad loose even after maximum adjustment. Sleeve length is perfect for me, though, and all things considered, I'm pleased as I recognise being a woman who is 6'2" and 155 lbs ensures no garment will fit me flawlessly unless I have it tailored. Overall worth spending the $70, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E.

customer_reviews.title: It's just not warm enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this with, I grew up in the South and I live in the North now. With that being said, unless it is above 75 I am cold. I have wore this coat for a little over a month, it is not a bad coat. It does help keep the wind and rain off me, and it does keep me warmer than my previous coat. The temps averaging around 30 degrees is when I get a little chilly in the coat, if I have not keep it on for a lengthy period of time. I would recommend this coat, since it is much better than my old coat.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because of the price but I didn't want to break the bank because I was buying this jacket for a ski trip which would probably be a one time thing. I bought one for my husband as well. The jacket was really warm and comfortable. It kept us warm and dry while skiing. It was definitely worth the money. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it can't be machined washed. It has to be spot cleaned or dry cleaned. Plus the tag notes that you may experience light fading when washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough for Minnesota winters!
customer_reviews.text: As a Minnesotan, I’m always a bit hesitant when people say a jacket is “warm.” We can get -30 below or colder. I am very happy with my purchase. Excellent quality, very warm but not overly bulky. I am 120 pounds and 5’6” and bought a small. It fits perfectly and I can wear a heavy sweater under it easily and comfortably. I would buy it again. The biggest downside is that I wish it was contoured. It’s more like a sack, but it does keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Newman

customer_reviews.title: More Than Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for an off road rally and actually didn’t get to open the box until I got there — so here I am several hours from home, afraid I won’t be able to ride if this jacket isn’t warm or doesn’t fit. ...it MORE than delivered. We rode four days in near-freezing temperatures, misty in the mornings. The pocket placement is well thought out, and they are reasonably deep. The waterproof zippers work great, detachable hood was easy to reattach. I’m 5’2” and 130 lbs, orderered a small and it fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin T.

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Red Winter coat is well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this coat. I had looked for a coat at stores and was only finding $400-$800 coats in designs I liked. That seemed insane so when I found this coat I thought I'd give it a try. It's been warm enough even on the coldest days. It's roomy enough for me to layer up but isn't too bulky. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. It washes up well and I get a lot of compliments on it's color and construction. I would definitely recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bugera

customer_reviews.title: Weak seams
customer_reviews.text: I was soo happy with the coat when I first got it. However it only mad it one winter season. It started to rip at the seams and I have had to stitch it back together. I'm so disappointed. This coat was very well taken care of and it wasnt out in anything worse than a michigan winter. If it weren't for the seams that I have had to put back together this coat would look brand new. It really was a let down. However it is still a very warm coat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Prewett

customer_reviews.title: I bought this jacket because someone had commented that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket because someone had commented that it was warm enough for a Wisconsin winter. Well, I am not sure what part of the state they live in, but 2 weeks ago I had this jacket on and it got down to 10 degrees at night. I bought it for work to go outside on breaks. I had on my work shirt, a sweatshirt, a zip up hoodie and this jacket on and was still cold. Needless to say this jacket probably won't be sufficient for the -0 days we get in Central Wisconsin in January. All in all, the jacket is ok. I may just be a little cold blooded for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: So warm!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this jacket. It’s very warm and has actual room that will fit a realistically sized human that is over 5’4 and 150 lbs, something that is hard to accomplish in stores. I got an XXL and it has a little bit more extra room than needed but I like it like that. I’m 5’7 and 195 pounds with a 40” bust. I suggest making this size the extra large since the average woman in America is a size 14 so it’s time for clothing providers to adjust to this.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Kelvas

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as competitors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coat as a solid winter coat as my older one no longer fit. I didn’t have a huge budget for it so I bought it with faith going off of the good reviews I read. I received it. Love it! Just as good (better when you factor in price) than my Spyder brand coat. I would definitely recommend it. I just shoveled snow outside with only a lightweight shirt on underneath my coat and I came in sweating! Holds heat well. Good quality. Fantastic price. PS I love the purple color I bought. I would recommend it all!
customer_reviews.author: Mzsharb

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tested it out yet, but seems warm!
customer_reviews.text: Other than a few early morning dog walks, I've not yet gotten out into the cold with this thing...knwing winter in Ohio though...the cold certainly will be coming soon! I also bought this for a trip to Iceland I am going on in February, so hopefully it stands up to snow and water. I bought the Large. Due to reviews, I almost ended up buying the XL. I am glad I didn't. The large fits great and still has plenty of room for layering. Will add pics later. I am 6' tall, 160lbs, usually size 10 pants. Usually large in tops and in coats.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, warm, blocks wind better than most.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my fiance who hasn't had a winter coat since high school (we're 33...). I chose a ski style coat because I've had good luck with them for our windy, wet, and snowy Michigan winters. She doesn't spend a ton of time outside, but it keeps her warm on her commute to work and blocks wind pretty well while she clears off her car. The real test will be when we get enough snow to take the kiddo out sledding.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

product_meta.title: Wantdo Women's Mountain Waterproof Ski Jacket Windproof Rain Jacket Winter Warm Snow Coat
feature_bullets: Warm Fabric: Professional water repellent coated, fuzzy lining and durable fabric with 240g polyester fibre which guarantees the best heat retention. Relaxed-fit style with quick-dry material.
Waterproof: Water-repellent rain jacket can work under over 10000mm pressure head. Keep your body always dry and comfortable when you are outside, also can fights bad rainy or misty weather.

Windproof: 1) Adjustable hook & loop fastener cuffs, stretchable glove with thumb hole help seal in warmth. 2) Inside windproof snap skirt, internal drawcord hem, detachable and adjustable storm hood help to keep wind out. 3) Wear resisting soft shell is highly wind resistant.

Multi Pockets: 2 zippered hand pockets, 1 zippered chest pocket (passport or cards stowed), 1 internal big mesh pocket, 1 internal secure media pocket, suit for keys, mobilephone, wallet and other accessories. An earphone line fastening and supporting fixture available inside the jacket.
Size notes: Jacket offers a standard fit. Please choose by US size.
Best use: This windbreaker ski jacket is an ideal outfit for downhill skiing, snowboarding, snowsports, hiking, rock climbing and other winter outdoor sports.
